text:
Carolyn A. Wilkins is Senior Deputy Governor at the Bank Of Canada (BOC). She was appointed in 2014 for seven years.
Wilkins was born in Peterborough, Ontario. She graduated from Wilfrid Laurier University in Waterloo, Ontario, with an Honours BA in Economics. She graduated from the University of Western Ontario in London, Ontario, with an MA in economics.
She joined the BOC in 2001. Before that she worked at the Department of Finance Canada and the Privy Council Office.
In 2016 and 2018 she was listed in Canada’s Most Powerful Women.
